src:
Najveći Zvezdin problem – njegovo visočanstvo gol
U četiri utakmice u Ligi šampiona, dok se igralo 11 na 11, nijedna lopta u protivničkoj mreži
07 Nov 2019 by Dejan Stanković
Kad govorimo o opusu Vladana Milojevića na klupi Crvene zvezde svi ćemo se saglasiti da je njegov najveći uspeh taj što je od beogradskog kluba napravio „Atletiko u malom“. Koliko god možda preterano zvučalo, jer nije to isti svet, crveno-beli su pod Milojevićevom komandom izrasli u ekipu koja je bar u kvalifikacionim evropskim mečevima, a vala i u Ligi Evrope, većinu rivala davila kao zmija žabu. I sve je to savršeno funkcionisalo dok se nije ušetalo u Ligu šampiona u kojoj, ruku na srce, uglavnom možemo samo da se divimo najvećim timovima Starog kontinenta, aplaudiramo im i konstatujemo da su nam ipak pobegli za čitavu jednu fudbalsku generaciju. Peku svi ovi porazi navijače, ali oni su prosto realnost, odraz trenutnih dometa. I greše sada svi oni koji kukaju na Zvezdinu defanzivnu postavku jer da nije bilo nje ne bi bilo ni one Lige Evrope od pre dve sezone, ni ove dve Lige šampiona.
Posebno greše zato što najveći Zvezdin problem ove sezone nije odbrana, već njegovo visočanstvo – gol.
Crvena zvezda naime u četiri ovosezonske utakmice u Ligi šampiona, dok se igralo 11 na 11, nije protnula nijednu loptu u protivničku mrežu. Ona tri komada koja je spakovala Olimpijakosu dala je posle isključenja Jasina Benzije. Imala je onu šansu Marka Marina u Minhenu, u Londonu u prvom meču protiv Totenhema jeste pokušavala, mada je ostala bez prave prilike, da bi u revanšu u Beogradu stvorila bar tri zicera koja na ovom nivou, protiv rivala koji je toliko tehnički i fizički jači, jednostavno ne smeju da se promaše.
Milan Pavkov u situaciji jedan na jedan sa Paulom Gazanigom. Pa stativa Radživa van la Pare. Na kraju još jedna protraćena šansa Pavkova, kad je pokušao da asistira Mateu Garsiji, a poslao loptu u prazno, daleko i od Garsije i od Marina.



Poređenja radi, prošle sezone u ipak za nijansu težoj grupi Crvena zvezda je iz jedine šanse u mučenju na Parku prinčeva postigla gol na gostovanju kod Pari Sen Žermena (1:6), tresla je i mrežu Napolija u porazu od 1:3 na San Paulu (tu je Veljko Simić imao i „mrtvu šansu“ na 0:1), a večno će se naravno pamtiti i ona dva pogotka Pavkova za epsku pobedu protiv Liverpula od 2:0. Svaku šansu koja joj se ukazala Zvezda je koristila.
I nije to bio nikakav izuzetak. Bilo je to pravilo. Uzela je Zvezda i sezonu ranije sve što joj je Krasnodar dao, uzela je i Salcburgu ispred nosa Ligu šampiona sa ona dva gola u razmaku od minuta. Zgrabila bi svaku šansu koja bi joj pala pred noge.
Ove jeseni to nije slučaj.
Razloga je mnogo. Prvo, pre dve sezone u Ligi Evrope gledali smo najboljeg Ričmonda Boaćija, pokretljivog, uvek opasnog... Ona epizoda na Dalekom istoku nikako mu nije prijala. Pavkov je prošle godine bio apsolutni hit, senzacija, gladijator oko koga se uvek nešto zbivalo, sada ni bleda senka tog igrača. I dalje on uspeva da dođe do šansi, ima urođen dar za to, ali talenat je ništa bez nadogradnje, a to u Milanovom slučaju ne vidimo. Ta početnička lopta ka Garsiji govori i o odsustvu samopouzdanja.



Ima i tu uzroka. I Pavkov i Boaći – ili bar jedan od njih dvojice – bili su spakovani za prodaju ovog leta. Pavkov je i bio u Kini, ali se vratio pošto se nije dogovorio oko ličnih uslova. Već davno ispričana priča. Zvezda je u međuvremenu dovela Tomanea, a onda se u praksi pokazalo da je prilikom prelaznog roka moralo više pažnje da se obrati na novo ograničenje stranaca u domaćem prvenstvu. Na stranu sad koliko je taj propis štetan za srpske predstavnike u Ligi šampiona – valjalo bi naširoko debatovati i o tome koji bi to domaći igrači mogli da donesu prevagu u Ligi šampiona, a da žele da igraju u srpskom fudbalu i da su u dometu naših klubova – za to ograničenje se znalo i moralo se više uvažavati.
Ovako, Tomane, Boaći i Pavkov jedan drugom jedu minutažu, ne zna se tačno ni ko je prvi špic i to se i te kako oseća na njihove partije u Evropi. A Evropa nam je valjda prioritet, zar to uporno ne ponavljavamo već godinama unazad dok odlažemo ligaške utakmice kako bi se timovi spremili za kvalifikacione mečeve tokom leta?
Da, sve bi možda bilo drugačije da je taj šut Pavkova ušao, ali kao što nisu bili slučajni već zasluženi ti golovi protiv Krasnodara, Salcburga, Liverpula, tako nije bilo ni ovo. I da, nije naravno sva krivica na napadačima, treba njima neko i da pospremi šansu, ali ako neko misli da će Vulić, Petrović, Jovančić, uz sve poštovanje njima i ostalima u crveno-belom timu, da pregaze Kutinja, Ndombelea ili ranije Veratija taj ima malo iskrivljenu sliku o fudbalu.
Ali ne, nije do defanzivne postavke. Jeste do kvaliteta. Pari Sen Žermen, Napoli, Liverpul, Bajern, Totenhem... Naivan je svako ko misli da Zvezda može da igra „egal utakmicu“ sa njima. Jedino što može je da, kao protiv Liverpula, ugrabi i najmanju priliku i uvede rivala u nervozu. Problem je samo što tih prilika u ovakvom odnosu snaga nema mnogo. I moraju da se koriste. 


ZVEZDINI NAPADAČI U EVROPI


TOMANEKvalifikacije za Ligu šampiona – 41 minutGolova: 0Liga šampiona – 152 minutaGolova: 0
MILAN PAVKOVKvalifikacije za Ligu šampiona – 119 minutaGolova: 2Liga šampiona – 188 minutaGolova: 0
RIČMOND BOAĆIKvalifikacije za Ligu šampiona – 524 minutaGolova: 3Liga šampiona – 70 minutaGolova: 1

text:
Zvezda's biggest problem - His Highness naked
In four Champions League games, while playing 11 to 11, not a single ball is in the opponent's net
07 Nov 2019 by Dejan Stankovic
When we talk about Vladan Milojevic's oeuvre on the Red Star bench, we will all agree that his greatest success was that he made the Belgrade club "Atletico in small". As much as it may sound overkill, because it is not the same world, the red and whites under Milojevic's command have grown into a team that at least in qualifying European matches, and the wave in the Europa League, gave most rivals like a snake frog. And it all worked perfectly until it entered the Champions League, where, by heart, we can mostly just admire the biggest teams of the Old Continent, applaud them and say that they have escaped us for a whole football generation. They bake all these defeats to the fans, but they are simply reality, a reflection of the current reach. And now all those who are hooking on Zvezda's defensive line are wrong because if it hadn't been there would not have been one Europa League since two seasons ago, nor these two Champions League.
They are especially mistaken because the biggest problem for Zvezda this season is not his defense, but his Majesty's goal.
The Red Star did not push a single ball into the opponent's net in four Champions League games this season, while playing 11 to 11. The three pieces she packed for Olympiakos were given after the exclusion of Jasin Benzi. She had the chance of Mark Marin in Munich, in London in the first match against Tottenham she tried, though she was left without a real opportunity, to create at least three jokes in Belgrade rematch at this level, against a rival who is so technically and physically stronger , They simply should not be missed.
Milan Pavkov in a one-on-one situation with Paul Gazanig. Well a tripod of Rajiv van la Para. Finally another wasted chance by Pavkov, when he tried to assist Mateo Garcia and sent the ball into the blank, away from both Garcia and Marin.



By comparison, last season in the tougher group, however, the Red Star scored the only chance of a torture at Prince Park in a visit to Paris Saint-Germain (1: 6), shaking Napoli's 1-3 defeat at San Paul (Veljko Simic also had a "dead chance" at 0: 1), and those two hits of Pavkov for the epic 2-0 victory against Liverpool will of course be remembered forever. Every chance the Star gave her was used.
And it was no exception. It was the rule. She took Star and the season before everything Krasnodar gave her, she also took Salzburg in front of the Champions League nose with those two goals in a matter of minutes. She would grab every chance she could at her feet.
This is not the case this fall.
There are many reasons. First of all, two seasons ago in the Europa League we watched the best Richmond Boaci, a moving, always dangerous ... That episode in the Far East was by no means appealing to him. Pavkov was an absolute hit last year, a sensation, a gladiator around which something was always going on, now not even a pale shadow of that player. He still manages to come up with chances, has an innate gift for it, but talent is nothing without an upgrade, and we don’t see that in Milan’s case. That beginner ball to Garcia also speaks to a lack of confidence.



There are also causes. Both Pavkov and Boaci - or at least one of the two - were packed for sale this summer. Pavkov was in China as well, but returned after not agreeing on personal terms. A long story told. The star, meanwhile, brought in Tomane, and then in practice it turned out that during the transition period, more attention had to be paid to the new restriction of foreigners in the domestic championship. Aside from how detrimental this regulation is to the Serbian Champions League representatives - it should be widely debated as to which local players could make a difference in the Champions League if they wanted to play in Serbian football and are within the reach of our clubs - this limitation was known and had to be respected more.
Thus, Tomane, Boaci and Pavkov eat each other's minutes, it is not known exactly who is the first spokesman and that is how they feel about their parties in Europe. And Europe is our priority, don't we keep repeating that for years as we postpone league games to get teams ready for qualifying matches in the summer?
Yes, everything might have been different had Pavkov's shot got in, but just as the goals against Krasnodar, Salzburg, Liverpool were not accidental, so was this. And yes, it is not all the fault of the attackers, of course, they need someone to take a chance, but if one thinks that Vulic, Petrovic, Jovancic, with all due respect to them and others in the red and white team, will overtake Kutinja, Ndombele or earlier this one has a slightly distorted picture of football.
But no, it's not up to the defensive line. You are up to quality. Paris Saint-Germain, Napoli, Liverpool, Bayern, Tottenham ... Naive is anyone who thinks the Star can play an "egal match" with them. The only thing he can do, as against Liverpool, is to take the smallest opportunity and make rivals nervous. The only problem is that there are not many strengths in such a relationship. And they have to be used.


STAR ATTACKS IN EUROPE
